statements: UPDATE curriculum_content SET title='Introduction to Programming', author='John Doe', content_type='Video' WHERE content_id=1;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET lesson_plan='Chapter 1: Basic Concepts', educational_materials=E'\x556e6976657273697479206d6174657269616c73' WHERE title='Introduction to Programming';
UPDATE curriculum_content SET title='Updated Title', author='New Author', content_type='Article' WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET author='Different Author', lesson_plan='New Lesson Plan', educational_materials=E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE content_id = 2;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET content_title = 'New Title' WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE lesson_plans SET plan_title = 'Updated Plan Title', plan_description = 'Revised Plan Description' WHERE plan_id = 3;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET content_title = 'New Title', content_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE lesson_plans SET plan_description = 'Improved Description', lesson_order = 5 WHERE plan_id = 3;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET title='Mathematics 101', description='Introduction to basic math concepts' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET content_url='http://example.com/math101' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET title='New Title', description='New Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET description='Updated Description', content_url='https://example.com/content' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET content = 'New updated content' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE lesson_plans SET description = 'Updated lesson plan description', created_at = '2022-01-10' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE lesson_plans SET description = 'Introduction to Chemistry' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE educational_materials SET file_path = '/path/to/file.pdf' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET content_title = 'New Title' WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE educational_materials SET material_link = 'https://example.com/new_link' WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE curriculum_content SET content_title = 'Updated Content Title' WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE lesson_plans SET plan_title = 'Updated Plan Title', plan_description = 'New Plan Description', plan_grade_level = 'Updated Grade Level' WHERE plan_id = 2;
